name: WackMan2
description:
I made a game called Wack Man many years ago.
It was a spin off of pack man.
It was pretty big, but i lost it over time.
So this is my attempt at making another one.
[A] shoot left, [D] shoot right, [S] drop bomb.
The demo is small but hopefully you can beat it.

Special thanks to: [for some of the music]

https://forum.yoyogames.com/index.php?threads/sharing-my-music-and-sound-fx-over...
